title: UserComments
description: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use Action-based vocabulary, alongside types such as Comment.

allOf.description: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use Action-based vocabulary, alongside types such as Comment.

commentTime.description: The time at which the UserComment was made.

creator.description: The creator/author of this CreativeWork. This is the same as the Author property for CreativeWork.

discusses.description: Specifies the CreativeWork associated with the UserComment.

replyToUrl.description: The URL at which a reply may be posted to the specified UserComment.
